children.teaser: Students provide simple explanations about how the nose works

children.title: Plants
children.teaser: Students acquire a fundamental understanding of plants and how they grow

children.title: Introduction to Plants
children.teaser: Students describe what plants need to live and grow

children.title: Plant Parts
children.teaser: Students identify the root, stem, leaf, flower and seed of a plant

children.title: The Life Cycle of a Plant
children.teaser: Students explain the basic life cycle of plants

children.title: The Gigantic Turnip
children.teaser: Students explain the basic life cycle of a turnip plant

children.title: The Honeybee's Flower Tour
children.teaser: Students describe the important role bees play in plant pollination

children.title: The Fruits of Polly's Labor
children.teaser: Students compare and contrast fruits and seeds of different plants

children.title: Johnny Appleseed
children.teaser: Students demonstrate familiarity with the tall tale "Johnny Appleseed"

children.title: Deciduous Trees
children.teaser: Students identify how deciduous trees are important to people and nature

children.title: Evergreen Trees
children.teaser: Students compare and contrast deciduous and evergreen trees

children.title: Plants and People
children.teaser: Students identify things that plants provide to people: oxygen, food and important products

children.title: George Washington Carver
children.teaser: Students will describe the life and scientific achievements of George Washington Carver

children.title: Farms
children.teaser: Students will understand the importance of farms as a source of food and other products people use

children.teaser: Students explain what is on a farm and identify animals on a farm

children.teaser: Students explain why farmers raise cattle and identify foods that come from cattle

children.title: And a Cluck, Cluck There

children.teaser: Students explain why farmers raise pigs and identify what food comes from pigs

children.title: Everywhere a Baa, Baa
children.teaser: Students explain why farmers raise sheep

children.title: All Kinds of Crops
children.teaser: Students identify crops as plants grown of farms for food

children.title: The Little Red Hen
children.teaser: Students sequence the seasonal rhythm of planting, growing and harvesting

children.title: The Seasons of Farming
children.teaser: Students describe how farmers protect their crops from drought and pests

children.title: From Farm to Market
children.teaser: Students sequence events of crops from farm to store

children.title: Native Americans Today

children.title: Colonial Towns and Townspeople

children.teaser: Students explain that earth is composed of land, water and air

children.teaser: Students sequence what happens to garbage from its creation to being dumped in a landfill

children.teaser: Students identify key natural resources and describe how people use them
